name: UNDP-GEF-BEE programme ,GEF provides funding for various activities to promote ECBC implementation
tracking_notes:
Annual Project Review/Project Implementation Reports (APR/PIR): These key reports are prepared
to monitor progress made since project start and in particular for the previous reporting period (30 June to
1 July). The APR/PIR combines both UNDP and GEF reporting requirements.

name: Issue of CPWD guidelines for sustainable habitat
